WorkItem.Description:
I have the Feb., 2010 release of WPF Toolkit, being used in VS2010.  I can create a line chart in XAML, with one or more LineSeries, and bind it/them to Observable Collection(s), just fine.  What I CAN'T do is add a LineSeries dynamically in code-behind. The moment I try to instantiate a LineSeries object, I get an error saying that a file can't be found.  If I execute this statement:
```
Dim mySeries As New System.Windows.Controls.DataVisualization.Charting.LineSeries
```
I get this message:
```
Locating source for 'C:\dd\WPF_1\src\wpf\src\ControlsPack\WPFToolkit\DataVisualization\Charting\Series\LineSeries.cs'. Checksum: MD5 {1b c6 9c 8d 23 3b 86 df 36 1f c1 94 a2 a3 79 66}
The file 'C:\dd\WPF_1\src\wpf\src\ControlsPack\WPFToolkit\DataVisualization\Charting\Series\LineSeries.cs' does not exist.

```
I tried uninstalling and re-installing the WPF Toolkit, to no avail.  This is a show-stopper, as my application must be able to read data and add new LineSeries objects dynamically.  The data being charted is not known at design-time.

Has anybody else had this issue?  Any ideas of a fix?  Thanks...

Comments.Message:
I notice that when I located the above file by Googling, then saved it on my system under where my WPF Toolkit is installed, I could browse to the file when my application error'd out, then select that file and continue.  This lets me add the single line series in code-behind.

However, when I try to add a second line series to the chart, I get a similar error, this time stating that the file "LineAreaBaseSeries.cs" is missing.  I guess the first file depends on the second file when adding additional LineSeries.

I must be missing something here.  Shouldn't the WPF Toolkit supply all of these items when it is installed?  Did I forget to reference something?  I referenced System.Windows.Controls.DataVisualization.Toolkit, then added namespaces in my xaml for DataVisualization and DataVisualization.Charting.

What is missing here?  Can anybody supply proper steps to be able to add LineSeries in code?
Thanks...
